package.name: uav_avoidance
package.description:
The uav_avoidance package implements a 2 dimensional collision avoidance system for the quadcopters called SWAP. On it, when two or more quadcopters are too close to each other, the system will command them to avoid the conflict creating a virtual roundabout.
The system was created only for colaborative uavs.
package.author: Eduardo Ferrera
